reading_tests.passage:
To: All Staff
From: Human Resources
Date: March 15
Subject: New Health Insurance Policy

Dear Colleagues,

We are pleased to announce that starting April 1, all employees will be enrolled in our new comprehensive health insurance plan. The new plan offers better coverage at a lower cost compared to our previous policy.

Key benefits include:
- Full coverage for annual health checkups
- Dental and vision care included
- 24/7 telemedicine services

A detailed information packet will be distributed to all departments by March 20. If you have any questions, please contact the HR department at extension 205.

Best regards,
HR Department
reading_tests.passage_zh:
收件人：全體員工
寄件人：人力資源部
日期：3 月 15 日
主旨：新的健康保險政策

親愛的同事們，

我們很高興地宣布，從 4 月 1 日起，所有員工將加入我們新的全面健康保險計劃。與之前的政策相比，新計劃以更低的成本提供更好的保障。

主要福利包括：
- 年度健康檢查全額給付
- 包含牙科和視力照護
- 全天候遠距醫療服務

詳細資訊包將於 3 月 20 日前分發至各部門。如有任何問題，請致電分機 205 聯繫人力資源部。

此致
人力資源部

questions.question: What is the purpose of this email?
questions.question_zh: 這封電子郵件的目的是什麼？
choices: To announce a new health insurance plan
questions.explanation_zh: 郵件開頭明確說明要宣布新的健康保險計劃，因此選項 A 正確。

questions.question: When will the new policy take effect?
questions.explanation_zh: 郵件提到「starting April 1」，因此選項 C 正確。

questions.question: What is NOT mentioned as a benefit of the new plan?
questions.question_zh: 以下哪項不是新計劃的福利？
questions.explanation_zh: 郵件提到健檢、牙科和遠距醫療，但未提及健身房會員，因此選項 C 正確。

reading_tests.passage:
BUILDING MAINTENANCE NOTICE

Date: May 10

Due to essential elevator maintenance, the north elevator will be out of service from May 15 to May 17. During this period, please use the south elevator or the emergency stairwell.

The maintenance will be conducted from 7:00 AM to 6:00 PM each day. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your cooperation.

For urgent matters during the maintenance period, please contact Building Management at (555) 123-4567.

Thank you for your understanding.

Building Management
reading_tests.passage_zh:
大樓維護通知

日期：5 月 10 日

由於必要的電梯維護，北側電梯將於 5 月 15 日至 5 月 17 日停止服務。期間請使用南側電梯或緊急樓梯間。

維護將於每日上午 7:00 至下午 6:00 進行。對於可能造成的任何不便，我們深表歉意，並感謝您的配合。

在維護期間如有緊急事項，請致電 (555) 123-4567 聯繫大樓管理處。

感謝您的理解。

大樓管理處

questions.question: What is being maintained?
questions.explanation_zh: 通知明確提到北側電梯將進行維護，因此選項 A 正確。

questions.question: How long will the maintenance last?
questions.explanation_zh: 從 5 月 15 日到 5 月 17 日共三天，因此選項 C 正確。

questions.question: What is the topic of the workshop?

questions.question: How much can you save with the early bird discount?

questions.question: What is included in the registration fee?
